11.content:
The perspective is important while writing about a gender swap so...

Are you male or female?

And then

Which kind of change are you going to tell us?

Male to Female

Female to Male


Well... Begin your adventure.
11.title: Gender

115.content:
Ok... You want to stay anonumous.

Then just tell us your story
115.title: (Anonymous author)

13.content:
I don't know if you agree with me, but I think characters should be able to move around by themselves, so I always avoid too young characters. Then this are your options to begin your story:

Preteen: You will be really young, but get enough freedom to have a story.

Teen: There are rules, but if the you, the author, are older, you know you can broke them most of them.

Young Adult: I think there's not need to explain from here on... I hope.

Between 30-40: First and second age crisis for many people

+50: There is still life to live, so go a live it.
13.title: Age

info.brief_description: men and women changing genders weight and ect...
info.description:
men, women, boys, and girls change

All right here are the rules:
adds that are at least a paragraph, no one sentence stuff
Not allowed:
Magic
Ray-Guns
Sex
Vore
Major weight gain (1,000 pounds in one meal type of thing)

Allowed:
Lesbian
Feeding, Force-feeding
